column2: U.S. top court rules against Tyson Foods in class action caseUPDATE 2-U.S. top court rules against Tyson Foods in class action caseU.S. top court rules against Tyson Foods in class action case WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday handed a loss to Tyson Foods Inc over the company's challenge to an almost $5.8 million class action judgment in a case won by workers at an Iowa pork-processing facility who contended they were underpaid.  U.S. top court rules against Tyson Foods in class action case WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday handed a loss to Tyson Foods Inc over the company's challenge to an almost $5.8 million class action judgment in a case won by workers at an Iowa pork-processing facility who contended they were underpaid. WASHINGTON
